Token.Abstract: * description: A wordcloud series. If the type option is not specified, it is inherited from chart.type. For options that apply to multiple series, it is recommended to add them to the plotOptions.series options structure. To apply to all series of this specific type, apply it to plotOptions. wordcloud.
* description: The color of the border surrounding each column or bar. In styled mode, the border stroke can be set with the .highcharts-point rule.
* description: The color of the border surrounding each column or bar. In styled mode, the border stroke can be set with the .highcharts-point rule.
* description: The color of the border surrounding each column or bar. In styled mode, the border stroke can be set with the .highcharts-point rule.
* description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.
* description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.
* description: When using automatic point colors pulled from the options.colors collection, this option determines whether the chart should receive one color per series or one color per point.
description: CSS styles for the words. default: {"fontFamily":"Impact, sans-serif"}
description: CSS styles for the words. default: {"fontFamily":"Impact, sans-serif"}
description: CSS styles for the words. default: {"fontFamily":"Impact, sans-serif"}

* description: This option decides which algorithm is used for placement, and rotation of a word. The choice of algorith is therefore a crucial part of the resulting layout of the wordcloud. It is possible for users to add their own custom placement strategies for use in word cloud. Read more about it in our https://www.highcharts.com/docs/chart-and-series-types/word-cloud-series#custom-placement-strategies : documentation * default: random

* description: This option decides which algorithm is used for placement, and rotation of a word. The choice of algorith is therefore a crucial part of the resulting layout of the wordcloud. It is possible for users to add their own custom placement strategies for use in word cloud. Read more about it in our https://www.highcharts.com/docs/chart-and-series-types/word-cloud-series#custom-placement-strategies : documentation * default: random

* description: This option decides which algorithm is used for placement, and rotation of a word. The choice of algorith is therefore a crucial part of the resulting layout of the wordcloud. It is possible for users to add their own custom placement strategies for use in word cloud. Read more about it in our https://www.highcharts.com/docs/chart-and-series-types/word-cloud-series#custom-placement-strategies : documentation * default: random
* description: Rotation options for the words in the wordcloud.
* description: Rotation options for the words in the wordcloud.
* description: Rotation options for the words in the wordcloud.
* description: A series specific or series type specific color set to apply instead of the global colors when colorByPoint is true.
* description: A series specific or series type specific color set to apply instead of the global colors when colorByPoint is true.
* description: A series specific or series type specific color set to apply instead of the global colors when colorByPoint is true.
* description: The corner radius of the border surrounding each column or bar.
* description: The corner radius of the border surrounding each column or bar.
* description: The corner radius of the border surrounding each column or bar.
description: 3D columns only. The width of the colored edges. default: 1
description: 3D columns only. The width of the colored edges. default: 1
description: 3D columns only. The width of the colored edges. default: 1

* description: Spiral used for placing a word after the inital position experienced a collision with either another word or the borders. It is possible for users to add their own custom spiralling algorithms for use in word cloud. Read more about it in our https://www.highcharts.com/docs/chart-and-series-types/word-cloud-series#custom-spiralling-algorithm : documentation * default: archimedean

* description: Spiral used for placing a word after the inital position experienced a collision with either another word or the borders. It is possible for users to add their own custom spiralling algorithms for use in word cloud. Read more about it in our https://www.highcharts.com/docs/chart-and-series-types/word-cloud-series#custom-spiralling-algorithm : documentation * default: archimedean

* description: Spiral used for placing a word after the inital position experienced a collision with either another word or the borders. It is possible for users to add their own custom spiralling algorithms for use in word cloud. Read more about it in our https://www.highcharts.com/docs/chart-and-series-types/word-cloud-series#custom-spiralling-algorithm : documentation * default: archimedean
